arts.ttl: Marco Silva ‘does not see many differences’ from Brentford under new management
arts.sum: Times are changing for the Bees in terms of personnel, but the project has not collapsed, and Marco Silva suggested there are not "many differences" in the blueprint. Fulham look for a second straight win in the 2025/26 Premier League season against Brentford in front of their fans on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva salutes Brentford’s plan to respond to a disruptive summer
arts.sum: Kevin, a club record signing from Shakhtar Donetsk, debuted at Craven Cottage as a substitute for Iwobi. Alex Iwobi picked up a knock in the 1-0 triumph over Leeds United last week.

arts.ttl: Brentford XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Keith Andrews takes his Brentford side to Craven Cottage for a tough West London derby on Saturday, aiming to end a poor run of form in this fixture. The Bees will be looking to build on a spirited penalty shootout win over Aston Villa in the League Cup in midweek, and find the consistency that […] The post Brentford XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Brentford – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fulham welcome Brentford to Craven Cottage on Saturday looking to secure a third consecutive win over their west London rivals in the Premier League. After a crucial victory against Leeds United before the international break, Marco Silva’s side will be looking to build momentum and secure back-to-back league wins for the first time this season. arts.ttl: Fulham vs Brentford – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: A fierce West London derby takes place at Craven Cottage on Saturday evening as Fulham host a Brentford side struggling for attacking creativity. Marco Silva’s Cottagers have dominated this fixture of late, completing the double over the Bees last season, and will be looking to build on a crucial win before the international break. arts.ttl: Fulham vs. Brentford injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest team news ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash between Fulham and Brentford.

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.
Elizabeth is joined by Brentford fan Billy to look forward to Saturday’s derby at the Cottage!

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 5
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Champions League action and Phil Agius provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.
